The claim states that Gamal Hamza and Junior Agogo are the only players to score in at least one event.

From the table, we can see that there are three types of events: Egyptian Premier League (EPL), Egypt Cup (EC), and Caf Champions League (CCL).

#### Step 3: Check if Gamal Hamza scores in more than one event
In row 7 of the table, Gamal Hamza has a score in CCL but no score in EPL or EC. However, we can see that he also has a score in another event by looking at the "total" column.

#### Step 4: Check if Junior Agogo scores in more than one event
In row 3 of the table, Junior Agogo has a score in CCL but no score in EPL or EC. However, we can see that he also has a score in another event by looking at the "total" column.

#### Step 5: Check if there are any other players scoring in more than one event
By examining all rows of the table, we can confirm whether Gamal Hamza and Junior Agogo are indeed the only players to score in at least one event.

However, his EPL score counts towards the overall total of 4, indicating that he also scores in at least one other event (not specified in the table).\nAfter checking all rows, there are indeed players scoring in more than one event: Gamal Hamza (all three), Junior Agogo (CCL and EPL but no EC), and many others with similar distributions.
